faq_1_q: What luggage sizes can I store?
faq_1_a: From backpacks to large suitcases. Check measurements when booking.
faq_2_q: How do I make a reservation?
faq_2_a: Select the day, choose your locker, and pay online securely.
faq_3_q: Can I access it at any time?
faq_3_a: Yes, 24h access with your personal code.
hero_title: Store your luggage in Córdoba from €5
location_description: Next to Córdoba's train and bus stations
meta_description: Smart luggage storage in Córdoba from €5/day
